name: Tap Hunter
overview:
TapHunter.com is a leading force within the craft beer movement that offers a variety of tools and resources to connect craft beer fanatics with the beers they love.

By keeping track of what’s on tap and where, Tap Hunter’s web and mobile technology platforms have the ability to direct millions of craft beer fans to the best beer-centric venues from pubs and breweries, to special events and festivals in 10 major cities across the US and Canada.

Tap Hunter has created an engaging online community comprised of beer gurus and enthusiasts, business owners, brewers and industry experts that acts as a social hub within the craft beer movement.

Tap Hunter’s users can: learn about the latest trends, news and events in craft beer, check the current lineup of brews at their favorite pubs; help update tap lists right from their bar stool (via the mobile app) to earn points and win prizes; and share their list of favorite brews via social media networks.

In addition to supporting the growing craft beer fan base, Tap Hunter is an advocate for ensuring the long-term success of the craft beer industry. The company offers breweries, bars and business owners a variety of cost-effective, easy-to-use, socially-engaging marketing products to expand their consumer reach.
